name: Neumorphic UI Components
description:
Playing with neumorphism in a dark theme. My steps on setting this up:

1) Choose your base. light shadow, dark shadow for base components. With neumorphism, a UI element's base and background share the same color to create the "soft" effect.
2) Apply X & Y dimensions, blur, and opacity.
3) Add intrusions & extrusions. Use inner shadows for intrusions. drop shadows for extrusions.

Then, tweak the levers depending on the depth effect you're aiming to achieve.
